txt.en:
'The text you recovered told of an alliance between Angmar and the Dourhands. Our scouts tell us that an emissary of the Dourhands has come to treat with Angmar.

'You should investigate the matter. There have been many reports of dwarves near the tower of Minas Angos near Barad Gúlaran. We must stop this alliance from happening, no matter the cost.

'Defeat the emissary, Laugi Goldentongue, then return back to me when the deed is done. If you are to succeed, you should take allies.'
'The downfall of the Dourhands' emissary will be sure to sever the alliance between these two evil powers. Well done, [placeholder].'
'Laugi Goldentongue must be defeated, else the Iron Crown and the Dourhands will forge a stronger alliance.'
Having discovered a pledge from the Dourhands, you must enter Minas Angos and defeat their emissary to stop an alliance between them and the Iron Crown.
Enter Minas Angos and defeat the emissary of the Dourhands.

Minas Angos is a tower in Barad Gúlaran, south of Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou must travel to Barad Gúlaran and defeat Laugi Goldentongue, the emissary of the Dourhands, inside Minas Angos. Brúnfair suggested you take allies.
Brúnfair is at Gath Forthnír, north of Barad Gúlaran.\n\nHaving defeated Laugi Goldentongue, you should return to Brúnfair and tell him of your victory.
